channel.title: NPC emote ID's Needed
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I need the attack, defence and death emotes of a Ice Strykewyrm (ID=9463), because my Ice Strykewyrms are getting all glitchy when they attack and die.
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/m2dko.png[/img]
Like that ^
Anyone knows where to find them?
Thanks, Unique.

item.title: NPC emote ID's Needed
item.dc:creator: @UniqueTrys UniqueTrys
item.description:
@UniqueTrys wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:4, topic:393989”][quote author=UniqueTrys link=topic=491174.msg3591955#msg3591955 date=1304715940]
Oh my god, I JUST found this one when I read this! Do you maybe have like a list of them? I’d really love to have one! Been searching for ages!
[/quote]List of what? strykeworms?[/quote]

No, like I don’t know where you’ve found it. But I was hoping you’d have a list just like you have item ID lists and stuff. By the way the strykewyrms turned out perfect :).

Read full topic

item.title: NPC emote ID's Needed
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Attack = 12791
Death = 12793
loadSpell = case 9463: random = Misc.random(2); if (random == 0 || random == 1) npcs[i].attackType = 0; else { c.freezeTimer = 20; npcs[i].attackType = 2; c.sendMessage("The Strykewyrm Used His Ice Bite And Froze You!"); } break;
npc info = npc = 9463 Ice_Strykewyrm 246 500
npcdrops.tsm info = #Ice strykewyrm 9463:40 995:500000 555:360 565:200 560:200 554:800 5303:5 5304:5 537:30 1514:50 384:50 4131:1 9244:20 9244:50 15050:1 989:1 3140:1 11732:1 989:1 11335:1 989:1

here is the spawn.cfg

spawn = 9463 2532 4650 0 1 35 450 500 ice spawn = 9463 2524 4656 0 1 35 450 500 ice

Info for this is

9463= id
2524/4656 is the coords
height =0 ( at that coord)
walk = 1 ( so it moves around one square
maxhit = 35
450 = attack
defence = 500
ice = description

tell me if you need anything else xD

Read full topic
